This is a competitive price considering the product's value to you, and I believe you'll be thrilled with the benefits it will bring to your life. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer
